'''Blockbench''' is a free and {{w|open source}} 3D-modeling application, designed for creating low-polygon models. Its development is supported by [[Mojang Studios]], who use the application internally for model and asset animation.<ref>{{citation|url=https://www.blockbench.net/wiki/blockbench/faq/|title=Blockbench FAQ|website=Blockbench Wiki}}</ref> It is also recommended as tool for model editing in the {{BE}} creator documentation.<ref>{{citation|url=https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/minecraft/creator/documents/blockbench?view=minecraft-bedrock-stable|title=Getting Started with Blockbench|website=Microsoft Learn|date=November 21, 2024}}</ref> Mojang Studios also provides official plugins for the software &ndash; namely the Minecraft Block Wizard, Minecraft Entity Wizard and Minecraft Item Wizard &ndash; to help creators with [[add-on]] development. It is also commonly used to make item models on {{JE}}.

== Features ==
{{Work in progress}}
Blockbench allows users to make custom models, as well as text in the style of the logo text on the [[Title Screen]] (with the help of a plugin), among other things. One can change their current model's appearance by changing its composition of [[w:Voxel|voxels]], and the texture file that maps onto them.

While it originally exclusively supported models that were only made of cuboids, more versions allow it to support and edit [[w:Polygon mesh|meshes]], [[w:Spline (mathematics)|splines]], [[w:2.5D#Billboarding|billboard sprites]], and [[w:Armature (computer animation)|armatures]].

=== Plugins ===
==== Minecraft Block Wizard ====
The '''Minecraft Block Wizard'''  is a Blockbench plugin created by Mojang designed to help the player create block models for ''Bedrock Edition''. It has a variety of options and presets, such as the Lectern preset.

==== Minecraft Entity Wizard ====
The '''Minecraft Entity Wizard'''  is a Blockbench plugin created by Mojang designed to help the player create entity models for ''Bedrock Edition''. It has most of the entities in vanilla Bedrock as presets, for the user to edit and animate to their liking.

==== Minecraft Item Wizard ====
The '''Minecraft Item Wizard''' is a Blockbench plugin created by Mojang Studios designed to help the player create item models for ''Bedrock Edition''. It has the [[apple]], the [[iron sword]], the [[iron pickaxe]], and [[iron armor]] as preset.
